title: Logic and Computer Design Fundamentals 5th c2016 Mano + Kime
description:
Logic and Computer Design Fundamentals, 5th Edition (c2016), textbook by M. Morris Mano, Charles R. Kime & Tom Martin.

TEXTBOOK INFO: <a href=" http://www.pearsonhighered.com/educator/product/9780133760637.page" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.pearsonhighered.com/educator/product/9780133760637.page</a>

COURSES: Digital Design [CORE TEXTS] (Electrical & Computing Engineering)

FEATURES: Thoroughly updated and revised after the addition of author Tom Martin (VPI&SU) to the team (see website for details)

BRIEF CONTENTS:
--------------
1- Digital Systems and Information
2- Combinational Logic Circuits
3- Combinational Logic Design
4- Sequential Circuits
5- Digital Hardware Implementation
6- Registers and Register Transfers
7- Memory Basics
8- Computer Design Basics
9- Instruction Set Architecture
10- Risc and Cisc Central Processing Units
11- Input-Output and Communication
12- Memory Systems
(detailed contents at website above)

FILE INFO: paginated, bookmarked, true PDF
